alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Williston to near Ocala. Movement was northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Fort McCoy, Citra, Sparr, Anthony, Cross Creek, Ocala Airport, Micanopy, Reddick and McIntosh. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Western Alachua; Western Marion
